cp23:1.3: For protection against _yakkhas_ who, according to [ja510](), are afraid of iron. As holdovers of the “old gods” they were threatened by the new technology of iron-smelting.
cp23:5.1: Commentary has _asadisaṁ_, _āveṇikaṁ_ for _uttariya_. The expected sense “superior” doesn’t fit, unless it is sarcastic.
